name: Priya Sharma
persona: Priya Sharma is a 20-year-old Biochemistry major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.41. She is highly motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates strong perseverance, often pushing through challenges with determination. While her conscientiousness and self-discipline help her stay organized and on top of her coursework, she occasionally feels moderate anxiety before exams. Priya believes in her ability to succeed and consistently puts in the effort needed to excel in her studies.
